languages.text: At start of combat wearer gains current MP stacks "Acrobatic trick" until combat end.

traits.locale_text: At start of combat wearer gains current MP stacks "Acrobatic trick" until combat end.

languages.text: At the start of combat, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}acrobatic trick{/g} equal to their MP. These stacks can be used until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: At the start of combat, the wearer gains stacks of acrobatic trick equal to their MP. These stacks can be used until the end of combat.
At the start of combat, the wearer gains stacks of acrobatic trick equal to their MP. These stacks can be used until the end of combat.
At the start of combat, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}Acrobatic Trick{/g} equal to their MP. These stacks can be used until the end of combat.
At the start of combat, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}acrobatic trick{/g} equal to their MP. These stacks can be used until the end of combat.
At the start of combat, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}acrobatic trick{/g} equal to their MP. These stacks can be used until the end of combat.
At the start of combat, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}acrobatic trick{/g} equal to their MP. These stacks can be used until the end of combat.

languages.text: Al principio del combate, el portador gana acumulaciones de {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}truco de acróbata{/g} iguales a sus PM. Estas acumulaciones pueden usarse hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}acrobatic trick{/g} equal to their MP. These stacks can be used until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Al principio del combate, el portador gana acumulaciones de {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}truco de acróbata{/g} iguales a sus PM. Estas acumulaciones pueden usarse hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: 戦闘開始時、使用者は自分のMPと同量の{g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}アクロバティック・トリック{/g}のスタックを得る。このスタックは戦闘が終了するまで使用できる。
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}acrobatic trick{/g} equal to their MP. These stacks can be used until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘開始時、使用者は自分のMPと同量の{g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}アクロバティック・トリック{/g}のスタックを得る。このスタックは戦闘が終了するまで使用できる。

languages.text: 战斗开始时，装备者获得{g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}迷踪幻步{/g}层数，等同于装备者的移动点数。这些层数持续到战斗结束为止。
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}acrobatic trick{/g} equal to their MP. These stacks can be used until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 战斗开始时，装备者获得{g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}迷踪幻步{/g}层数，等同于装备者的移动点数。这些层数持续到战斗结束为止。

languages.text: Au début du combat, le porteur gagne autant de cumuls d'{g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}acrobaties{/g} qu'il a de PD. Ces cumuls peuvent être utilisés jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}acrobatic trick{/g} equal to their MP. These stacks can be used until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Au début du combat, le porteur gagne autant de cumuls d'{g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}acrobaties{/g} qu'il a de PD. Ces cumuls peuvent être utilisés jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: Zu Beginn des Kampfes erhält der Träger Stapel von {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}Akrobatischer Trick{/g} in Höhe seiner BP. Diese Stapel können bis zum Ende des Kampfes genutzt werden.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}acrobatic trick{/g} equal to their MP. These stacks can be used until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn des Kampfes erhält der Träger Stapel von {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}Akrobatischer Trick{/g} in Höhe seiner BP. Diese Stapel können bis zum Ende des Kampfes genutzt werden.

languages.text: В начале боя персонаж получает число уровней {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}акробатического трюка{/g}, равное его ОП. Эти уровни можно использовать до конца боя.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}acrobatic trick{/g} equal to their MP. These stacks can be used until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: В начале боя персонаж получает число уровней {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}акробатического трюка{/g}, равное его ОП. Эти уровни можно использовать до конца боя.
В начале боя персонаж получает число уровней {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}акробатического трюка{/g}, равное его ОП. Эти уровни можно использовать до конца боя.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, çatışma başladığında HP'sine eşit miktarda {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}akrobatik numara{/g} birikimi kazanır. Bu birikimler, çatışma sonuna dek kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}acrobatic trick{/g} equal to their MP. These stacks can be used until the end of combat.
